com.percussion.cms.objectstore
Class PSDisplayFormat

java.lang.Object
  com.percussion.cms.objectstore.PSDbComponent
      com.percussion.cms.objectstore.PSVersionableDbComponent
          com.percussion.cms.objectstore.PSDisplayFormat
All Implemented Interfaces:
IPSCmsComponent, IPSDbComponent, IPSCatalogIdentifier, IPSCatalogSummary, com.percussion.services.data.IPSCloneTuner, Serializable, Cloneable
public class PSDisplayFormat
extends com.percussion.cms.objectstore.PSVersionableDbComponent
implements IPSCatalogSummary, com.percussion.services.data.IPSCloneTuner

Represents a single display format object defined by the system. A display format lets describes how to render a search/view output.

See Also:
PSVersionableDbComponent, Serialized Form

Constructor Detail

PSDisplayFormat

public PSDisplayFormat()
                throws PSCmsException
Creates a new format with default values for the label, internal name, display type and community. The label defaults to something of the form 'Display Format n', where n is a small integer, that increments with every generated object. The type is set to TYPE_VIEWSANDSEARCHES and it is visible to all communities.

Throws:
PSCmsException

createKey

isValidForRelatedContent

public boolean isValidForRelatedContent()
Convience method to check whether this display format is valid for 'Related Content' Search results. A display format valid for related content search views is not valid for any other views because 'sys_variantid' does not apply for any other views.

Returns:
true if this display format contains (COL_CONTENTTYPEIDor COL_CONTENTTYPENAME) and (COL_VARIANTIDor COL_VARIANTNAME), otherwise false

isValidForViewsAndSearches

public boolean isValidForViewsAndSearches()
Convience method to check whether this display format is valid for views and searches to use. A display format is valid for views and searches if the display format is not valid for related content. See the isValidForRelatedContent() for more details.

Returns:
true if it is valid, otherwisefalse

isValidForFolder

public boolean isValidForFolder()
Convience method to check whether this display format is valid for folders to use. A display format is valid for folders if the display format is not valid for related content and does not contain any categorized columns. See the isValidForRelatedContent() for more details.

Returns:
true if it is valid, otherwisefalse

toDbXml

public void toDbXml(Document doc,
                    Element root,
                    com.percussion.cms.objectstore.IPSKeyGenerator keyGen,
                    PSKey parent)
             throws PSCmsException
Description copied from class: PSDbComponent
See IPSDbComponent.toDbXml(Document,Element,IPSKeyGenerator,PSKey) for details. Creates an xml fragment properly formatted for the Rhythmyx server that will modify the database to make the db instance of this object consistent with this object. A resource designed to handle this document must be created by the implementor of the component. This document is for use w/ the default processor. This resource name must be specified in the processor's configuration data.

To allow multiple updates to be processed by the server, the document generated by this method will conform to one of the two following formats (where root is the passed in element):

If requiresActionNode() is true or parent is not null - 


    <!ELEMENT root (Action+)>
    <!ELEMENT Action (getNodeName())>
    <!ATTLIST Action
       dbAction #REQUIRED (INSERT | UPDATE | DELETE)
       >
    <!ELEMENT getNodeName() (as defined by toXml())>

    <!-- If the state is DBSTATE_NEW, the Action type is set to INSERT.
       If the state is DBSTATE_MODIFIED, the Action type is set to UPDATE.
       If the state is DBSTATE_MARKEDFORDELETE, the Action type is set to
       DELETE.
       -->

Otherwise - 


    <!ELEMENT root (getNodeName())>
    <!ATTLIST getNodeName()
       dbAction (INSERT | UPDATE | DELETE) "UPDATE"
       >
    <!ELEMENT getNodeName() (as defined by toXml())>

    <!-- If the state is DBSTATE_NEW, the Action type is set to INSERT.
       If the state is DBSTATE_MODIFIED, the Action type is set to UPDATE.
       If the state is DBSTATE_MARKEDFORDELETE, the Action type is set to
       DELETE.
       -->
In most cases, this method will generate the full element. It should only have to be overridden if the derived class contains any child IPSDbComponents. In that case, call this method first, then call this method for all child members, passing the same root.

Specified by:
toDbXml in interface IPSDbComponent
Overrides:
toDbXml in class PSDbComponent
Parameters:
doc - This document will be used to create the elements in the result xml fragment. Never null.
root - The generated element will be appended to this node. Never null. If the component doesn't need updating, it won't be appended.
keyGen - This object is used to create new keys when a component has a key that hasn't been assigned yet. Never null.
parent - The parent key of this object. It must be null if the key of the object does not contain parent key (as its foreign key); otherwise it must not be null.
Throws:
PSCmsException - If any of the components of the specified type have unassigned keys.

toXml

protected Element toXml(Document doc,
                        boolean includeChildComps)
Description copied from class: PSDbComponent
This method is called by the PSDbComponent.toDbXml(Document,Element,IPSKeyGenerator,PSKey) method. Derived classes without IPSDbComponents as children do not need to override this method. If the derived class has children, it must override this method and not include those in the generated Xml.

By default, this method just calls toXml(doc) since this method doesn't have any IPSDbComponent members.

Overrides:
toXml in class PSDbComponent
Parameters:
doc - Used to generate the elements, never null.
includeChildComps - If true, equivalent to calling toXml(doc). If false, all IPSDbComponent members will not be serialized. They must be added individually with their own Action element at the root level.
Returns:
An element whose node name is the value returned by getNodeName(). Never null.

toXml

public Element toXml(Document doc)
Description copied from class: PSDbComponent
See interface for description. The document generated by this class conforms to the following dtd (note that that the entries and values are logical and would need to be replaced with their correct runtime values to generate a valid dtd): 

    <!ELEMENT getNodeName() (getLocator().getNodeName()...)>
    <!ATTLIST getNodeName()
       state (DBSTATE_xxx) "DBSTATE_NEW"
       >

Note that since getNodeName() will return the derived classes node name, the derived class can use this method to generate the element and just add to it.

Specified by:
toXml in interface IPSCmsComponent
Overrides:
toXml in class PSDbComponent
Parameters:
doc - - the document from which the element node will be created. Never null.
Returns:
- the newly created XML element node. Never null.

fromXml

public void fromXml(Element e)
             throws com.percussion.design.objectstore.PSUnknownNodeTypeException
Description copied from class: PSDbComponent
See interface for description. The key is regenerated by taking the node name and using that to derive a class name. An instance of this class is created by passing the key's element to the ctor.

Each component must have a single argument ctor that takes an element and calls its fromXml. The derived class' fromXml must call this method (using super.fromXml) to restore the proper key and db state. Note that this would not be required when initially constructing from xml, but it is required if fromXml is called on an already instantiated object.

This method verifies that the name of the supplied element matches the name obtained with the PSDbComponent.getNodeName() method. If it doesn't, a PSUnknownNodeTypeException is thrown.

Specified by:
fromXml in interface IPSCmsComponent
Specified by:
fromXml in interface IPSDbComponent
Overrides:
fromXml in class com.percussion.cms.objectstore.PSVersionableDbComponent
Parameters:
e - The node to extract the data for this instance. Never null. See toXml for the required format of the supplied element.
Throws:
com.percussion.design.objectstore.PSUnknownNodeTypeException - If the element name is incorrect, if the key isn't correct (see PSKey.fromXml(Element)) or the state name is not valid.

addCommunity

public void addCommunity(String communityId)
Add the supplied community to the set of communities which have access to this object.

Parameters:
communityId - To add a particular community, supply the community id (not name), it will be added to the set of communities already associated with this object. To allow anyone to access this object, supply null or empty. Supplying null or empty will clear all entries currently associated with this object.

equals

public boolean equals(Object obj)
Description copied from interface: IPSCmsComponent
Indicates whether some other object is "equal to" this one. All implementing classes must override this method as the default behavior is incorrect for deep clones. If the implementation does not follow the contract documented for this method in Object, then it must clearly state how it deviates from that contract. The following algorithm should be used:
  1. Call the base class (unless Object) and if true is returned, continue.
  2. Compare all members of current class.
  3. If all members are equal, return true.

Specified by:
equals in interface IPSCmsComponent
Specified by:
equals in interface IPSDbComponent
Overrides:
equals in class com.percussion.cms.objectstore.PSVersionableDbComponent
Parameters:
obj - the reference object with which to compare. May be null;
Returns:
true if this object is logically equivalent to the supplied obj; false otherwise. If null or not an instance of this class, false is returned.

clone

public Object clone()
Description copied from class: PSDbComponent
Creates a new instance that is a deep copy. If derived classes have non-native, mutable member variables, they must override this method, call super and deep clone them.

Specified by:

setAllowedCommunities

public void setAllowedCommunities(Map<IPSGuid,String> allCommunities)
Sets a list of allowed communites from the supplied all communities. This is a transient data and will not be saved into the persistent layer.

Parameters:
allCommunities - a list of all communites, never null, but may be empty. It maps the GUID of the communities to their names.
See Also:
getAllowedCommunities()

getAllowedCommunities

public Map<IPSGuid,String> getAllowedCommunities()
Gets a list of allowed communities, which is a transient data and will not be saved into the persistent layer. Must call setAllowedCommunities(Map) first and must not modify the properties afterwards.

Returns:
a list of allowed communities, which maps the communities GUIDs to their names. It may be null if has not been set by setAllowedCommunities(Map).
See Also:
setAllowedCommunities(Map)
